items.name: case average(countIncludesPadding: Bool)
items.desc: A function for pooling that computes the average of each element in the pooling kernel.

items.name: case l2Norm
items.desc: A function for pooling that computes the square root of the sum of squares of each element in the pooling kernel.

items.name: case max(indices: UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Int>?, xDilationStride: Int, yDilationStride: Int)
items.desc: A function for pooling that computes the maximum of each element in the pooling kernel.

items.name: case unMax(indices: UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Int>?, xDilationStride: Int, yDilationStride: Int)
items.desc: A function for pooling thatâ€™s the partial inverse of max pooling and sets all nonmaximal values to zero.
